attributes.action: Rule of six should be suspended on 25th October 2020
attributes.additional_details: Government of UK should suspend the rule of six on 24 and 25th October 2020 on the occasion of Vijaya Dashami to allow Nepalese community to celebrate with their extended family. Vijaya Dashami is the biggest festival for Nepalese. This festival meant to celebrate with extended family members.
attributes.background: Government of UK should suspend the rule of six on 24 and 25th October 2020 on the occasion of Vijaya Dashami to allow Nepalese community to celebrate with their extended family.

rejection.details:
We're sorry we didn't get your petition before Vijaya Dashami, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Extend any easing of Covid-19 restrictions for Christmas to all religious events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553575
